title: Fated by Darkness
description: Please note that this was originally published under the title If I Fall and has been revised and lengthened.When Sadie was younger, she was taken by terrible people who made her do horrible things. Traumatized by what happened, she begins seeing ghosts everywhere.Even after those people are behind bars, Sadie continues to see ghosts and struggles to live a normal life. But when she feels a connection to Sage, her brother’s friend and band mate—who Sadie is secretly in love with—she wonders if a bit of normalcy might be possible. But Sage has secrets too. Dark secrets that might be connected to Sadie's past.Please note that this story contains a little bit of supernatural/paranormal elements, along with some romance and suspense.
author: Jessica Sorensen
